text.p: -- EVEREN Securities Inc said Monday it raised its long-term rating on Federal Realty Investment Trust to outperformer from market performer.

-- Analyst Burl East said EVEREN increased its funds from operations estimates for 1997 to $2.07 a share from $2.01 and for 1998 to $2.20 from $2.17. He said the growth expectation for the company was increased to seven percent from six.
-- EVEREN's near-term and long-term price targets were raised to $28 and $30 from $24 and $26, respectively.
-- EVEREN said Federal Realty is showing an increase in growth as well as improving operating margins, and is pushing aggressively into California.
-- Shares of Federal Realty traded unchanged at 27-1/2.
